name: Pop Owl 2
description:
Pop owl 2 is coming! what are you waiting for? Let's landing little owl's planet, and eliminate these cute owls!
Following classic Crush games with simple operation. You just need to gather at least 3 of the same owls, and slide to eliminate them to get score! Eliminate multiple owls continuously will bring more exiting audio-visual enjoyment!
Let's challenge these 20 ingenious levels. There's no time limit, just use your moves and fight through it!
